revised_title: Cellular Method for Close-Packed Hexagonal Lattice: Theory and Symmetry Properties
tldr: The author presents a theory for the cellular method applied to a close-packed hexagonal lattice with two atoms per unit cell. They discuss the symmetry properties of the lattice and the boundary and continuity conditions for the wave function. The study focuses on the group of the vector and its representations, providing a foundation for understanding the behavior of electrons in these lattices.
